title: Finding the derivative
text: To find the critical points, we need to find the first derivative of the function. For reference, we can use the power rule to differentiate this function.

title: Finding the critical point(s)
text: The critical point(s) are the values of $$x$$ which cause the first derivative of the function to be equal to zero.

title: Solve for the value(s) of $$x$$ that set the first derivative of the function to zero.
